definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: You are seated in a reclining position on a recumbent bike.
sentences.chinese: 你是坐在躺臥的位置上橫臥自行車。

sentences.english: There are recumbent water bridge, just like a colorful rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 還有橫臥水上的小橋，宛若一道五彩的虹。

sentences.english: Like a rainbow, the Seventeen-arch Bridge is captivating, lying on the lake in the mists.
sentences.chinese: 浩淼煙波中，十七孔橋似長虹偃月橫臥水面。

sentences.english: Pier plans Bo cut the waves, lying in the blue sea like a long queue silver wave.
sentences.chinese: 棧橋劃波斬浪，象一條長龍橫臥於碧海銀波。

sentences.english: He likes to read while lying in bed.
sentences.chinese: 他總是喜歡橫臥在牀上看書。

sentences.english: Greater luck hath no man than this, that he lie down his wife at the right moment.
sentences.chinese: 使其妻橫臥而得其時者，僥倖無過於斯人。

sentences.english: Looks to the window outside, the returns cabin reclines on the prairie.
sentences.chinese: 向窗外望去，返回艙橫臥在草原上。

sentences.english: In the blue sky were grey clouds; in the far distance was the green mountain.
sentences.chinese: 藍天上灰雲朵朵，極目處青山橫臥。

sentences.english: One thousand lying hidden towers, ranging from wind actually open.
sentences.chinese: 千枝橫臥隱樓臺，不等東風竟自開。

sentences.english: It crawls on the mountain like a giant dragon.
sentences.chinese: 如同一條巨龍，橫臥在虎山之上。

definition: to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
to close (flower, eyes, suitcase etc)/to bring together/(insect or bird when not flying) to fold (its wings)
